00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_FORWARD_ARGS_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_FORWARD_ARGS_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/preprocessor/arithmetic/inc.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/preprocessor/control/expr_if.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/preprocessor/punctuation/comma_if.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_params.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_params_with_a_default.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_trailing_params.hpp>

00020 #include <boost/mpl/aux_/na.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>

00023 //#include <boost/assign/v2/detail/keyword/default.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/config/limit_arity.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion_matrix/container.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/copy.hpp>
00028 
00029 namespace boost{
00030 namespace assign{
00031 namespace v2{
00032 namespace put_compose_aux{
00033 
00034         template<
00035         std::size_t N, typename L,typename Tag1, typename Tag2,
00036         BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_WITH_A_DEFAULT(    
00037                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, 
00038             typename T,
00039             boost::mpl::na
00040         )
00041     >
00042         class args : ref::wrapper<
00043         ref::assign_tag::copy,
00044                 ref::fusion_matrix_aux::container<N, L, Tag1, Tag2,
00045                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, T)
00046         > const
00047     >
00048     {
00049                 typedef ref::fusion_matrix_aux::container<N, L, Tag1, Tag2, 
00050                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, T)
00051         > value_;
00052         typedef ref::assign_tag::copy assign_tag_;
00053                 typedef ref::wrapper<assign_tag_, value_ const> super_t;
00054         
00055         public:
00056         
00057         args(){};
00058         
00059         args(value_ const& v) : super_t( v ){}
00060 
00061                 value_ const& value()const{ return this->unwrap(); }
00062     
00063     };
00064 
00065         template<
00066         std::size_t N, typename L,typename Tag1, typename Tag2,
00067         BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, typename T)
00068     >
00069         args<N, L, Tag1, Tag2, 
00070         BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, T)
00071     >
00072     make_args(
00073         ref::fusion_matrix_aux::container<N,L,Tag1, Tag2, 
00074                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, T)
00075         > const& v
00076     ){
00077         typedef args<N,L,Tag1, Tag2, 
00078                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY, T)
00079         > result_;
00080         return result_( v );
00081     }
00082 
00083 #define MACRO1(z, n, data) \
00084         BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n)\
00085         input.value().static_column(\
00086         boost::mpl::int_<n>()\
00087     )\
00088 
00089 
00090 #define MACRO2(z, K, data)\
00091         template<\
00092         typename O,\
00093         std::size_t N, typename L,typename Tag1, typename Tag2\
00094         BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(K, typename T)\
00095     >\
00096     O const&\
00097         forward_args(\
00098         O const& object,\
00099         put_compose_aux::args<N, L, Tag1, Tag2 \
00100                 BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(K, T)\
00101         > const& input\
00102         )\
00103     {\
00104         return object(\
00105             BOOST_PP_REPEAT(K, MACRO1, ~)\
00106         );\
00107         }\
00108 
00109 
00110     
00111 BOOST_PP_REPEAT(
00112         BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY),
00113     MACRO2,
00114     ~
00115 )
00116 
00117 #undef MACRO1
00118 #undef MACRO2
00119 
00120 }// put_compose_aux
00121 }// v2
00122 }// assign
